segments.text: Yes . I graduated this past June .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which university did you graduate from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I received a bachelor's degree in Economics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What courses did you take in college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My major courses were Microeconomics , Macroeconomics , International Trade , International Finance , World Economy , Psychology and Business English
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you choose to study Economics ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I was quite interested in Economics then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you speak other languages except English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can also speak a little Japanese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am very satisfied with your answers .
segments.speaker: S1
